title: Christmas Industries (Art Exchange)
content:
[[include :scp-wiki:theme:black-highlighter-theme]]
[[include :scp-wiki:theme:extra-black-highlighter-theme]]
[[include :scp-wiki:component:toggle-sidebar-bhl]]
[[module CSS]]

 :root {
    --header-title: var(--title);
    --header-subtitle: var(--subtitle);
    --title: "Hunter Industries";
    --subtitle: "Open yourself to our products.";

    --logo-image: url("http://scp-pl.wdfiles.com/local--files/hunter-industries-hub/hunterlogobasaltnew");
}
[[/module]]

[[include :scp-wiki:component:info-ayers
|lang=en
|page=component:info-ayers
|authorPage= https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/trouts-authorpage
|comments= Cool art. Check out my writing!]]

[[=]]
[[module Rate]]
[[/=]]


[[=image http://scp-sandbox-3.wikidot.com/local--files/troutmaskreplica-exchange/Hunterindy]]


[[=]]
[[collapsible show="To Zygard" hide="yo yo"]]
uh, hey! here's my gift for you. Sorry I couldn't *exactly* follow what you requested. I am godawful with CSS, and I couldn't think of anything to write that would expand hunter industries.

Instead, I drew this. It was stressful but I'm thankful it's out by now. So, uh, here you go! If you do write any more of HI, hit me up and I might draw something else for it.

Thank you,

Your gifter, TroutMaskReplica
[[/collapsible]]
[[/=]]
----
@@ @@
@@ @@

author: TroutMaskReplica
